item.content:encoded: Official: Hong Kong drug operation hauls $98 million worth of cocaine - CNN: BBC NewsOfficial: Hong Kong drug op... http://t.co/ZZj9nJwu A joint drug investigation in Hong Kong hauled a record cocaine shipment worth an estimated street value of U.S. $98 million, officials said.
